features: TempLock™ double wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks up to 72 hours iced, 32 hours cold, and 20 hours hot
Kewler™ Cap made with ThermaGrid™ waffle insulation to preserve your drink at optimal temperature
EarthGrip™ powder coat finish is tactile, easy to grip, and extremely durable
18/8 kitchen-grade electropolished stainless steel doesn't transfer flavor, no metal aftertaste
Compatible with Roaster™ and Roaster™ Loop caps
